page.title: 04HOUSING:WILBERLEE & HILLTOP.
page.content: Around 70% of the housing is owner- occupied and include both outright owners and those still paying off mortgages.There is a somewhat above average level of private renting in this block with a strong relationship between levels of private renting and the age of the housing stock. About 12% of the houses are Council property.The Longlands Estate on Hill Top comprises of 100 properies built in the 1950's.Approximately one third of these houses have been bought by former tenants and this trend is increasing. The 1985 Colne Valley Local Plan reports that almost 10% of houses in the Slaithwaite/Marsden area lack such basic amenities as a bath,an indoor toilet and hot water:-a proportion higher than anywhere else in Kirklees. This situation could get worse.
